title: 80B.12 APPLICATION OF CORPORATE TAKEOVER LAW.
text:
[Repealed, 1984 c 488 s 19]
If the target company is a public utility, public utility holding company, national banking association, bank holding company or savings association subject to regulation by a federal agency and the takeover of such company is subject to approval by that agency sections 80B.01 to 80B.13 shall not apply.
[Repealed, 1984 c 488 s 19]
